Classes

struct  depth_lhs< glue_type, T1 >
 Template metaprogram depth_lhs calculates the number of glue_data<Tx,Ty, glue_type> instances on the left hand side argument of glue_data<Tx,Ty, glue_type> i.e. it recursively expands each Tx, until the type of Tx is not "glue<..,.., glue_type>" (i.e the "glue_type" changes). More...
struct  depth_lhs< glue_type, glue_data< T1, T2, glue_type > >
struct  mat_ptrs< glue_type, T1 >
 Template metaprogram mat_ptrs fills a given array with addresses of matrices from a recursive instance of glue_data<Tx,Ty, glue_type>. While parsing the recursive instance, if encountered objects are of type op_data<..>, they are converted to type 'mat' first. More...
struct  mat_ptrs< glue_type, glue_data< T1, T2, glue_type > >
struct  mat_ptrs_outcheck< glue_type, T1 >
 template metaprogram mat_ptrs_outcheck builds on 'mat_ptrs' by also checking whether any of the input matrices are aliases of the output matrix More...
